channel.title: Npcs don't attack when using mage
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm using a Devolution 7.0 server source and im making it so you need runes to cast spells but when i attack an npc using non-autocast it hts but they don't fight back.
All help is appreciated. Thanx! :)
